skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: DYAI2025

security_audit.summary: Pure content-only skill containing 10 markdown theme files with color/font specifications. No executable code, no network calls, no file system access beyond its own directory. Risk-free.

content.user_title: Apply themed color and font styles to artifacts
content.value_statement: Presentations and documents often lack visual consistency. This skill provides 10 curated themes with color palettes and font pairings. Apply a theme instantly to any slide deck or document for professional styling.
actual_capabilities: Display visual showcase of all 10 available themes
Apply pre-defined color palettes with hex codes
Apply font pairings for headers and body text
Generate custom themes on demand from descriptions
Ensure proper color contrast and readability
Maintain theme consistency across all slides
limitations: Does not modify actual files or output code directly
Theme application is guidance-based for the AI
Fonts limited to DejaVu and FreeSans families
Custom theme generation follows existing pattern

use_cases.title: Style corporate presentations
use_cases.description: Apply Ocean Depths or Modern Minimalist for polished decks that impress clients and stakeholders.

use_cases.title: Create branded materials
use_cases.description: Use Tech Innovation or Sunset Boulevard for creative pitches and marketing content.

use_cases.title: Build engaging course materials
use_cases.description: Select themes that match subject matter for clearer, more appealing educational content.

prompt_templates.title: Choose a theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the theme showcase so I can choose a theme for my presentation.

prompt_templates.title: Apply a theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the [THEME NAME] theme to my slide deck. Use the colors and fonts from that theme consistently.

prompt_templates.title: Generate custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a custom theme for [DESCRIBE YOUR PURPOSE/CONTEXT]. Create a name, color palette with hex codes, and font pairings.

prompt_templates.title: Theme review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the current slide deck and confirm the [THEME NAME] theme is applied consistently with proper contrast and readability.

output_examples.input: Apply the Forest Canopy theme to my sustainability presentation
output: Colors: Forest Green #2d4a2b, Sage #7d8471, Olive #a4ac86, Ivory #faf9f6
Best for: Environmental content, sustainability reports, wellness presentations

best_practices: Match theme to content context and audience expectations
Verify color contrast meets accessibility standards
Apply theme consistently across all slides or pages
Use the theme showcase to preview before selecting
anti_patterns: Mixing fonts from different themes in one document
Ignoring contrast warnings for text readability
Applying multiple themes within the same artifact
Using a theme that conflicts with the content message

faq.question: What AI tools work with this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Works through natural language prompts.

faq.question: How many themes are included?
faq.answer: Ten pre-set themes: Ocean Depths, Sunset Boulevard, Forest Canopy, Modern Minimalist, Golden Hour, Arctic Frost, Desert Rose, Tech Innovation, Botanical Garden, and Midnight Galaxy.

faq.question: Can I create custom themes?
faq.answer: Yes. Describe your needs and the skill generates a custom theme with colors, fonts, and a descriptive name following the same format.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-based skill with no code execution, no network access, and no file modifications.

faq.question: What file types can I apply themes to?
faq.answer: Any artifact the AI creates including slides, documents, reports, and HTML pages. The skill provides styling guidance.

faq.question: How does this differ from other theme tools?
faq.answer: Pure prompt-based approach with no dependencies. Works across all Claude AI tools. Provides both pre-made and on-demand custom themes.
